text: Charles E. Merrill Jr. (1920 – November 29, 2017) was an American educator, author, and philanthropist. He was best known for supporting historically black colleges and founding the Commonwealth School in Boston. Merrill Jr. died on November 29, 2017, in Nowy Sącz, Poland at the age of 97. ==References== ==Other websites== * Commonwealth School Website * Article re Merrill College at UC Santa Cruz Category:1920 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Educators from Massachusetts Category:Philanthropists from Massachusetts Category:Writers from Massachusetts
